Title: Checklist Discipline – Daily Drill
Notes: Say 'Checklist start / checklist complete' for: Preflight, Run-up, Before-Takeoff, Pre-Maneuver, Before-Landing.

Title: Pre-Maneuver Checklist – Flight Reminder
Notes: Perform before every maneuver: Fuel selector BOTH, Mixture RICH, Carb heat ON, Landing light ON, Clearing turns COMPLETE.

Title: Radio Workflow – ATIS Volume Reset
Notes: After lowering ATIS audio, reset volume immediately.

Title: Radio Workflow – Pre-Load Next Frequency
Notes: Set the next required frequency in STANDBY before flip-flop.

Title: Departure Discipline – No Talking
Notes: No talking during takeoff roll and initial climb until Tower hands you to Departure.

Title: Heading Bug – Before Maneuver
Notes: Bug intended heading before steep turns, slow flight, or climbs/descents.

Title: ABCD Engine Failure – 10-Second Flow
Notes: Airspeed → Best Field → Checklist → Declare. Goal: complete flow in ≤ 10 seconds.

Title: Engine Failure Restart Flow Memorization
Notes: Carb heat ON → Fuel selector BOTH → Mixture RICH → Throttle ¼ → Primer IN/LOCKED → Mags BOTH.

Title: Carb Heat Idle Check
Notes: Perform carb heat idle RPM drop test during run-up.

Title: Landing – Smooth Power
Notes: Practice holding constant, relaxed power inputs on approach.

Title: Landing – 'Plane in Your Hands' Mindset
Notes: Commit to decisions. Reduce over-corrections. Eyes far down runway.

Title: Visual Flying Partial Panel
Notes: Continue practicing reference to horizon for control without attitude indicator.

Title: Slow Flight Efficiency
Notes: Aim to enter slow flight within 20 seconds step-by-step.

Title: Steep Turns – Altitude Discipline
Notes: Maintain ±100 ft, roll-out on bugged heading ±10°.

Title: Pattern Visualization – Daily
Notes: Visualize downwind → base → final. Eyes far, pitch picture, flare timing.

Title: Take-Me-Back Scenario Practice
Notes: Simulate 10SM inbound call, pattern entry, and frequency planning.

Title: Relax Hands on Controls
Notes: Grip: 2–3 fingers, relaxed wrist, no stiffness.
